resources.string: Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
An application requires installation of Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play services.
An application requires an update to the Android Wear app.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
"This app won't run without Google Play services which are missing from your phone."
"This app won't run without Google Play services which are missing from your tablet."
"This app won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"This app won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"This app won't run unless you update the Android Wear app."
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services which some of your applications rely on is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
Do not like the HUD? Set a notification instead.
Set notification every time the phone boots.
Launch Widget Picker to add widget to home screen.
Set a floating widget to turn the screen off and open the power menu.
Cleaning up before shutting down HUD.
"To prevent crashes you cannot enable and disable the HUD incessantly. Unfreezing option in:"
Set HUD every time the phone boots.

The Screen On feature using the gravity sensor is still in the experimental stages. Rotate your phone as shown below. The feature only turns the screen on. You are welcome to try it out and give me feedback that you think might be valuable.
Show me how to turn the phone on using this feature.
Turn the screen on by rotating the phone once. There are no wakelocks used so do not worry about battery consumption. This feature will only turn the screen on it will not turn it off.
Start the Screen On service whenever the phone boots up.
Get SuperUser permissions to enable the application.
This will find your power button on the device.
If the above option did not work please try this.
Quickly configure power button and application settings.
Remove ads by making a purchase
Like my work? Consider making a donation.
Provide anonymous usage of the application to the developer for betterment of the application.
Check out Power Button by Torcellite - http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.torcellite.powerbutton
This item has already been purchased by you thanks.
"Icon credits to DesignMagnet.net Thanks for the support!"

"Sadly Android will not let applications automatically add widgets to the home screen. You can add it by pressing and holding on your main screen this will allow you to go to the widget picker menu; where you can pick Power Button widget and place it wherever you like on your homescreen."
Swipe down the notification for more info
This notification is to keep the screen on service of the Power Button application alive.
Power Button has not been mapped by the application. Click the button below to configure.
Power Button has not been mapped by the application. Please click the image to map the power button.

"You are trying to manually configure the power button. The application will show you the buttons and their event numbers. Event numbers are the numbers after the word event. If you see eventX associated with the word power pwr or anything that you think might be associating the event with the power key - please input that number into the text box below. This will map your power button to the application. Thanks for the patience."
Power Button has been mapped and the application is ready to be used.
Could not find your input device. Please try the manual configuration.
Please wait for the AsyncTask to be cleared.
Done! Try using the application. If it did not work try mapping the button again.
The power button has not been mapped yet. Please map the Power Button.
"Sorry your power button cannot be automatically mapped below ICS. Please use the manual map feature instead."
"Sorry notification with buttons cannot be enabled below ICS. Use the widget instead."
Since notifications are disabled you do not need this option.
Root access has been granted thank you.
Root access was denied or revoked please check your SU settings.

"1. Added in-app purchase to remove ads - priced at 99 cents. 2. Added shortcuts. 3. Added translations if the translations are inaccurate and you are interested in translating the application please mail me."

"A lot of effort was put into the making of this application. If you like it Consider making a donation. Do not forget to rate the application if you do not want to donate. Donating is completely voluntary. This will not unlock any new features or remove ads. To remove ads buy the remove ads package."

"The quick setup is short and is recommended that you go through it once. Please be patient at every step and move onto the next one only after a confirmation message. You can press back at any time to exit. Thanks!"
Please grant the application SuperUser Permissions by pressing the button below.
The application will now try to map your power button automatically please wait for a confirmation.
The application could not map your power button. Press the button below to manually map it. Do not worry it is very simple.
"Would you like to set a notification for easy access? The notification contains a button to turn your screen off and open your power menu."
"Would you like to set the HUD (floating widget) for easy access? The HUD contains a button to turn your screen off and open your power menu."
Would you like to add a widget to your home screen for easy access?
Please click me to continue the HUD tutorial.
The HUD contains a Screen Off button S and Power Menu button P.
You can move the HUD about by long pressing it it will settle on the side of the screen it is closest to.
The HUD automatically hides itself after a few seconds.
The HUD can be shown again by just touching it.
That is the end of the HUD tutorial.
